meanings.sent1: She overloads her backpack with heavy books for school.
meanings.sent2: He always overloads the washing machine, causing it to shake.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally overloads the pizza with too many toppings.
meanings.sent4: Her mind overloads with information during the exam.
meanings.sent5: The truck driver overloads the vehicle beyond its capacity.

meanings.sent1: The overloads of work made him stressed and tired.
meanings.sent2: Carrying all those heavy bags felt like an overloads on her shoulders.
meanings.sent3: The overloads of laundry waiting to be done seemed never-ending.
meanings.sent4: The overloads of responsibilities weighed heavily on his mind.
meanings.sent5: The overloads of information in the report were difficult to process.
